name: It's been a long time, but where not done yet!
name_original: It's been a long time, but where not done yet!
description:
this is a entry for the "Epic Megajam 2020"!

origanily this was going to be a stealth game.

but the skope for that idea was to big.

So I did make something else out of it.

its not the most strong adiptation of the theme but it does the job i guess.

and although its not the strongs adpitation of the theme, I'm stil verry happy with it! (for my 6th game dev project, I think its not that bad)

the game does not explicet tells you what to do but there is a win state.

finding this win state is the challange of this game! ;) (there are multiple ways to do this!)

have fun, and all feedback is welcome! :) (even if u didden't liked it)

PS: srry for my bad english and bad dialog in generall in advance! ;p
